main event: One round red, orange and green object the size of a baseball was observed in Plano, Illinois on 16 October 1956.
interesting points: The object had flashing lights associated with it., The object was still in sight at the time of the initial report., The size of the object was described as being comparable to a baseball held at arm's length., The object was observed high in the sky after initially being close to the ground., The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: one round object with red, orange, and green colors
